EmailTemplate.name: QBOE Agent Created Case Resolved Response
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
QBOE Support,
We are pleased to inform you that your issue has been resolved. The resolution has been implemented and this bank account should be ready for your use.
Thank you, CustomerCentral Support
If you need to update your incident or give us more information, please click here to go to our website.
